Klasse ConfigManager

java.lang.Object
constants.ConfigManager
public class ConfigManager extends Object
ConfigManager handles application configuration settings.

This class manages loading and saving configuration from/to external files. It supports both properties files and provides fallback to default values.

The configuration file is stored in the application's directory as 'config.properties'. If no configuration file exists, default values are used and a new file is created.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios
